items.title: Sleeping Less Than This Amount Could Cut Years Off Your Life, Study Finds
items.description: Sleep has immediate payoff, but it also impacts life expectancy.

items.title: This Ultra-Minimalist Phone Wants to End the ‘You Are the Product’ Era
items.description: Punkt’s new minimalist phone is radically, beautifully simple. And it puts users back in charge.

items.title: How These Innovative Founders and CEOs Are Preparing for the Year of the Fire Horse
items.description: The Year of the Fire Horse will likely favor innovative founders, bold builders, and leaders willing to rebel and disrupt.

items.title: Anthropic Just Launched a Feature That Turns the Claude App Into a Virtual Co-Worker
items.description: The new feature allows you to give Claude access to a desktop folder—but you’ll want to be careful about what you share.

items.title: We Need Female Leaders in Technology Fields
items.description: For many reasons, diverse leaders and teams are key to modern success
